description: Multiple cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerabilities in phpList 2.10.13 and earlier allow remote attackers to hijack the authentication of administrators for requests that (1) create a list or (2) insert cross-site scripting (XSS) sequences.  NOTE: this issue exists because of an incomplete fix for CVE-2011-0748.  NOTE: the provenance of this information is unknown; the details are obtained solely from third party information.
